description: This file defines a mock class 'RenderSessionMock' for unit testing, which inherits from 'RenderSessionImpl' and uses Google Mock to create mock methods for the RenderSession interface.

classes.name: RenderSessionMock
classes.description: A mock class for RenderSession used in testing, providing mock implementations for all virtual methods defined in the parent class.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Mock method to start the render session.

methods.name: stop
methods.description: Mock method to stop the render session.

methods.name: getDisplayName
methods.description: Mock method to retrieve the display name.

methods.name: getSocketName
methods.description: Mock method to retrieve the socket name.

methods.name: touchTime
methods.description: Mock method to update the session's touch time.

methods.name: pause
methods.description: Mock method to pause the session.

methods.name: resume
methods.description: Mock method to resume the session.

methods.name: mute
methods.description: Mock method to mute the session.

methods.name: unmute
methods.description: Mock method to unmute the session.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Mock method to reset the session.

methods.name: selectCcService
methods.description: Mock method to select closed caption service.

methods.name: selectTtxService
methods.description: Mock method to select teletext service.

methods.name: selectDvbService
methods.description: Mock method to select DVB service.

methods.name: selectWebvttService
methods.description: Mock method to select WebVTT service.

methods.name: selectTtmlService
methods.description: Mock method to select TTML service.

methods.name: selectScteService
methods.description: Mock method to select SCTE service.

methods.name: sendTimestamp
methods.description: Mock method to send media timestamp.

methods.name: sendData
methods.description: Mock method to send data.

methods.name: getSessionType
methods.description: Mock method to retrieve session type.

methods.name: setTextForClosedCaptionPreview
methods.description: Mock method to set text for CC preview.

methods.name: setCustomTtmlStyling
methods.description: Mock method to set TTML styling.

methods.name: hasCustomTtmlStyling
methods.description: Mock method to check TTML styling presence.

methods.name: setCcAttributes
methods.description: Mock method to set CC attributes such as colors, font style, and opacity.
